summary: SummaryMAC Clear Lipglass is a highly concentrated, unique lip gloss that can create a glass-like finish or a subtle sheen.
details: DetailsBenefitsMirror-like shineIconic lip glossProvides a glass-like shineConditions lipsSmooths lipsDesigned to be worn on its own, over lip pencil or lipstick, it's the perfect lip gloss for creating shine that lastsA tiny bead of this highly concentrated product is all that's needed to cover the lip areaClear Lipglass lip gloss can be mixed with other products like pigments, and can be applied anywhere on the body except for the eye area to create interesting effectsKey IngredientsJojoba Oil: Helps soften and condition the lips.Formulated WithoutFragranceOilFormaldehydeHydroquinoneTriclosanCoal TarTolueneItem 2510567How To UsePrep lips with Prep + Prime Lip before applying color.Apply to lips using the doe-foot applicator.For fuller-looking lips, concentrate Lipglass lip gloss in the center of lips.Apply on top of your favorite Lipstick to add a high-shine effect with intense color.IngredientsHydrogenated Polyisobutene, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol.Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Prep lips with Prep + Prime Lip before applying color.Apply to lips using the doe-foot applicator.For fuller-looking lips, concentrate Lipglass lip gloss in the center of lips.Apply on top of your favorite Lipstick to add a high-shine effect with intense color.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

reviews.headline: The Queen of all glosses!
reviews.comments: This gloss is thick, sticky and thats what makes it long lasting! I do not like thin oily glossesâ€¦ give me sticky gloss anyday! There is NO other gloss that will give you such a glass look to your lips! I do wish MAC would come out with jelly colors of these. I do wish it had a slight vanilla scent like all their other lippies. This is a staple in my gloss collection!

reviews.headline: My new holy grail
reviews.comments: I LOVE this clear gloss. Its not scented and it is sooo shiny. It is very thick, which some may find unappealing, but for me I feel it nourishes my lips and lasts longer. My ONLY problem with it is that it leaks a bit when you open it, so its a bit hard to control the amount on your lips. It is also a bit pricey but this will last you a while. It is by far the glossiest lip product i have ever used, and doesnt dry out my lips!

reviews.headline: I have been using MAC gloss for years. I love it.
reviews.comments: Best gloss hands down

reviews.headline: Holy Grail Product
reviews.comments: Please never take this away MAC this is the best lipgloss ever created.

reviews.headline: My fave lip gloss
reviews.comments: I love this lip gloss. It lasts for hours. I use it when my lips are dry because it's moisturizing.

reviews.headline: Staple lip gloss!!
reviews.comments: This is my go to when my lips are super dry. It lasts and lasts, gives shine and make my lips look pretty. This is not your drugstore lipgloss. Its thick, which i really like.

reviews.headline: Shine brite like a diamond
reviews.comments: Just get it! That's all!

reviews.headline: My Favorite
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this lipglass. Yes it's sticky, but it gets the job done. I can wear this lipglass to sleep and it is still on my lips in the morning. This lipglass works better than the other higher end glosses I wear.

reviews.headline: Lipglass
reviews.comments: This lipglass leak bad.

reviews.headline: Long lasting staple lip gloss
reviews.comments: I love the formula of the clear lipglass. Its a thick, non sticky and hydrating formula! Will definitely repurchase. Feels amazing on the lips and stays put!

reviews.headline: pretty good glass
reviews.comments: really good gloss its longlasting but its sitcky and its a little difficult to apply, put it stays put and doesn't really leak outside of lips

reviews.headline: don't buy
reviews.comments: too sticky , waste of money

reviews.headline: Looks glassy but very sticky
reviews.comments: This lip gloss definitely lives up to its name. It makes my lips look very glass like and shiny. However, the formula is extremely sticky and the gloss itself is very thick. This really makes the gloss last a while on the lips though. The gloss doesn't have a smell nor taste to it either. Honestly my lips don't feel more moisturized or soft after using it. But my lips do look very pretty and shiny when wearing. I would say this gloss is mostly for looks and their are much cheaper alternatives.

reviews.headline: sticky mess.
reviews.comments: I hate this stuff tbh. I won't say it doesn't deliver on shine, because it does. but it's unbelievably sticky and heavy. feels like wearing goop on your lips. will string together when you open your mouth. hair gets stuck in it 24/7. applicator just doesn't work because it's so sticky. works as an eyegloss, but that's it. I recommend the essence lipgloss instead.

reviews.headline: I love this lip glass!
reviews.comments: The best lip gloss ever!

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: This is cute, temporarily. Non moisturizing, deying .

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again cost a lot
reviews.comments: I did not buy any powder makeup here because then and I have my skin tone in the liquid or powder and they ran out of pencils that I needed for my lips so yes I didn't get anything from them on that situation.

reviews.headline: super sticky
reviews.comments: the stickiest lip gloss i've ever used. i usually only wear lip gloss because i don't like how lipstick looks on me so i'm super picky about lip gloss. an ulta employee recommended this gloss to me and it sucks. its sooo stick to the point where you get the stringy things when you try and open your mouth. i also don't know how, but the lip gloss ran down the outside of my tube from its not so nice packaging and i've tried cleaning it off but its still sticky. even if you like sticky gloss, i wouldn't recommend because its just too much stick.

reviews.headline: Yes Yes and Yes
reviews.comments: All time fav lip gloss. Lasts way longer on my lips than any other brand ive tried. With others im having to constantly reapply, not this one. Though I will say it is sticky, on a day I have my hair down & if a strand gets caught on my lips its bye bye strand of hair lol packaging could be better. Stuff oozes out on its own after awhile. Nonetheless the long lasting part is what makes it worth it for me

reviews.headline: Love it but Hate it
reviews.comments: The formula for this gloss is my favorite of all time. Smooth on the lips, glass like shine and lasts for a long time all while nourishing your lips.I give it 4 and not 5 stars is because no matter what, it will leak (even if I wipe the applicator).

media.headline: I have been using MAC gloss for years. I love it.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I bought this gloss to put over my matte lipsticks which I feel are often too dry. This made a world of a difference. When I put this over my matte lipstick it makes it look 100x better; my lips no longer look dry and shriveled and instead look like something out of a makeup catalog! In the beginning the gloss is extremely glossy and shiny but as time goes on it looks less like glass and more like a sheen. Still extremely nice! 

However, the lipgloss is very thick and sticky. That is, when my lips are closed and I open them, you see the gloss pull apart. After a little while, the gloss amount reduces and is ultimately much dryer but has a sheen to it. This is when it looks best in my opinion.
A bit later, the gloss really starts to come off and takes the lipstick off with it. At this point, your lips feel moderately sticky and there is little shine to them.
I took off a star because of the aforementioned problems, however on the overall it gets the job done which is why it earns 4 stars! 

Highly recommend this product for anyone who wants to wear it over matte lipstick! The shape of the gloss makes it easy to put the gloss on over lipstick and you don't have to worry about a brush getting stained!
faceoff_positive.headline: Not perfect, but it's a game changer

faceoff_negative.comments: I really liked this lip gloss, until it leaked in my purse.  No matter how tight I put the cap, it leaked.  I'm not a fan of these types of containers for that very reason, but decided to try it because I needed a clear lip gloss and I know MAC has awesome products.  Disappointed that I ended up throwing it away before I even got to use 1/4 of it.  I would prefer if it came in a regular lip gloss container with a brush or sponge applicator.
faceoff_negative.headline: Like it but...
